originalCode:
# System utilities
SYSTEM_UTILS=(
  btop
  lazygit
  lazydocker
  stow
  fzf
  fastfetch
  zip
  unzip
  wget
  curl
  epiphany
)

# Development tools
DEV_TOOLS=(
  vim
  bat
  neovim
  starship
  tmux
  git
  alacritty
  PackageKit
  python3
  python-as-python3
  python3-devel
  python3-pip
)

# System maintenance
MAINTENANCE=(
  baobab
  binwalk
  blueman
  bluez
  bluez-cups
  bluez-tools
  dnfdragora
  gnome-system-monitor
  gnome-weather
  gnome-text-editor
  cmake
  typescript
  nodejs-npm
  meson
  gjs
  gjs-devel
  gobject-introspection
  gobject-introspection-devel
  gtk3-devel
  gtk-layer-shell
  upower
  NetworkManager
  pam-devel
  pulseaudio-libs-devel
  libdbusmenu-gtk3
  libsoup3
)

# Desktop environment
DESKTOP=(
  hypr
  hyprctl
  hypridle
  hyprlock
  qt5ct
  qt6ct
  rofi-wayland
  swaync
  waybar
  bc
  findutils
  gawk
  grim
  gvfs
  gvfs-mtp
  hyprpolkitagent
  ImageMajick
  inxi
  jq
  kvantum
  network-manager-applet
  openssl
  pamixer
  pavucontrol
  pipewire-alsa
  pipewire-utils
  playerctl
  python3-requests
  python3-pip
  python3-pyquery
  python-as-python3
  qt6-qtsvg
  slurp
  swappy
  wget2
  wl-clipboard
  wlogout
  xdg-user-dirs
  xdg-utils
  yad
  brightnessctl
  ioupe
  mousepad
  mpv
  mpv-mpris
  nvtop
  qalculate
  nwg-displays
  cliphist
  nwg-look
  SwayNotificationCenter
  pamixer
  swww
  wallust
)

# Media packages
MEDIA=(
  vlc
  flameshot
  gimp
  krita
  kicad
)

# Fonts
FONTS=(
  aajohan-comfortaa-fonts
)

# services
SERVICES=(
  NetworkManager.service
  bluetooth.service
)
